UNIQUE, CONVENIENT & ATTRACTIVE DESIGN: Jhola Basta Watch Box boasts a unique, beautiful and a more convenient design than the other watch boxes out there. Our talented team have worked hard to produce the perfect balance of modern, sophistication and class to create this unique box. Unlike others our box can be easily opened and closed with one hand for the most convenient use.


Handcrafted watch box incorporates the ability to completely customize your accessory storage through a unique modular system. The smart box design makes it easy to carry while the lid lock makes it easy to use. Perfect gift for girls in wedding, engagement, evening ceremony, or other auspicious occasions.
